title: Looking for Active gold players for tourneys
body: Beholds Esports Red (iron-gold) are looking for new active members to finalize our roster. Roles are negotiable, being active is the biggest determining factor tho. You can msg me in game or join our discord and well go from there. https://discord.gg/hfQZscV Plz post your ign and role if u join the discord thx heaps
